title: The Outlook for U.S. Stocks and Bonds: Talking with GMO's Ben Inker
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and deputy editor Ben Levisohn speak with Ben Inker, co-head of GMO’s Asset Allocation team on the outlook for U.S. stocks and bonds.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and deputy editor Ben Levisohn speak with Ben Inker, co-head of GMO’s Asset Allocation team on the outlook for U.S. stocks and bonds.
